name: Absorb End
_source: s;Kajal;At last...{w}{br}The power I have long sought. My master's spirit.
s;Kajal;His strong will... his defiance of death...{w}{br}They shall be mine as well.
s;Kajal;Now, to ensure that the noble houses remain ever-standing.{w}{br}Simon Verstadt, I entrust this power to you...
s;Titus;Simon, you've really made a mistake here.{w}{br}The world will forever be in danger from this maniac.
s;Titus;I won't trust someone who makes these decisions so carelessly!
s;Kajal;I thank you, Simon. Truly.{w}{br}I had worried you would betray me.
s;Simon;You've been an immense help so far, Kajal.{w}{br}And as much as I doubt Vesner's actions, your words may have some truth to them.
s;Simon;To defy fate...{w} we need to take more drastic action.
s;Simon;What are your plans now? You've finished your journey, after all.
s;Kajal;I hope to continue aiding you.{w}{br}I aspire to continue Lord Vesner's work and preserve the noble houses.{w}{br}And together, we might stand a chance against the Fates.
s;Simon;Well, we'll appreciate your help moving forward.
